item.title: Deep Dive JS
item.description: JavaScript Tags: Advance, Frontend, Interview Resources: https://frontendmasters.com/courses/deep-javascript-v3 1. Types Primitive Types: string number boolean object symbol undefined bigint undeclared? null? function? array? All are subtype of Object type. NaN and isNaN NaN (not a number) is a Invalid Number. var a = Number("n/a") console.log(a) // NaN console.log( a === a) // false 2. Coercion Coercion is a type conversion Number It coercion the object value to String first. // Corner case: Number("n") // NaN Number("-0") // -0 Special case:
